dailyFunStuff.title: A teacher in Georgia is running over 50 miles to meet his students!
dailyFunStuff.content:
Bill McAllister, last taught class on March 16th before the coronavirus caused the cessation of in-person classes. He has since decided to run and visit all his students to pick up their day. For those there's aren't home, he leaves wholesome notes in their mailboxes.

We absolutely love heartwarming stories like these, and wish Bill all the best on his runs!

citation.name: Georgia teacher running more than 50 miles to visit each student outside their homes â€“ Fox News
